line_1: But spak their thoughts in plain, braid lallans,
line_2: In days when mankind were but callans,

line_1: But spak their thoughts in plain, braid lallans,
line_2: At Grammar, Logic, an' sic talents,

line_1: But spak their thoughts in plain, braid lallans,
line_2: They took nae pains their speech to balance,
